sentences.english: The puppet of Baigujing is made from animal skin in 1979.
sentences.chinese: 白骨精的皮影是1979年用動物皮製作而成。

sentences.english: Monkey Hit Lady White Bone Thrice is one of its most brilliant plots.
sentences.chinese: 書中最讓我感動的故事是“三打白骨精”。

sentences.english: Baigujing is very bad. You can see that from her face and signiture move.
sentences.chinese: 從面部和招牌動作就可以看出白骨精有多壞了。
